Title: Relates to voting rights in cooperative apartments
Summary: Provides that the sponsor of a cooperative apartment building or condominium units may not continue to sit on the board or to vote after the transfer to the cooperative corporation or condominium ownership.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting a sponsor from becoming a director or voting on the board after a building has been converted to a cooperative apartment building or condominium ownership
